name: desegregation
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the action of ending segregation (= separation) between races or sexes in a place or organization: Racial desegregation had not, it seemed, led to class desegregation. the desegregation of boys and girls in school See
desegregate
More examplesFewer examplesthe desegregation of drinking fountainsCivil rights activitists campaigned for desegregation."Housing desegregation is probably the last struggle of the civil rights movement," he said.School desegregation is viewed by all races as a positive step toward racial harmony.
